fields.name: value
fields.desc: The currently selected value for this slider.

fields.name: secondaryTrackValue
fields.desc: The secondary track value for this slider.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called during a drag when the user is selecting a new value for the slider by dragging.

fields.name: onChangeStart
fields.desc: Called when the user starts selecting a new value for the slider.

fields.name: onChangeEnd
fields.desc: Called when the user is done selecting a new value for the slider.

fields.name: min
fields.desc: The minimum value the user can select.

fields.name: max
fields.desc: The maximum value the user can select.

fields.name: divisions
fields.desc: The number of discrete divisions.

fields.name: label
fields.desc: A label to show above the slider when the slider is active and [SliderThemeData.showValueIndicator] is satisfied.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use for the portion of the slider track that is active.

fields.name: inactiveColor
fields.desc: The color for the inactive portion of the slider track.

fields.name: secondaryActiveColor
fields.desc: The color to use for the portion of the slider track between the thumb and the [Slider.secondaryTrackValue].

fields.name: thumbColor
fields.desc: The color of the thumb.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The highlight color that's typically used to indicate that the slider thumb is focused, hovered, or dragged.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.slider.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: semanticFormatterCallback
fields.desc: The callback used to create a semantic value from a slider value.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: allowedInteraction
fields.desc: Allowed way for the user to interact with the [Slider].

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: Determines the padding around the [Slider].

fields.name: year2023
fields.desc: When true, the [Slider] will use the 2023 Material Design 3 appearance. Defaults to true.
